phrases: I will plunge this world into darkness!
That is as far as you go, Devil Count!
That hero's getting in the way at the good part again!
I believe in you, Devil Earl!
When will there be a monster that can defeat Justice Man?
Heroes do not lose to anyone?
And yet, they always just die in the end...
But I want to support them...
That the popular guys win and the unpopular guys lose is a tragedy.
I will not lose to anyone.
I will become the ultimate monster.
We will buy your brand-name items
I do not really remember what happened last night.
Regarding Director Zeimeet's assault by a thug last night...
We are certain that Garo the hero hunter was behind it.
So that means he is not only going after heroes.
He is going after the Association itself.
He is strong enough to defeat Tank-Top Master.
Regular guards will not be enough.
Executives should avoid going outside unnecessarily
and, if they must go anywhere, have Class S heroes accompany them.
The Class S heroes have been rather busy dealing with monsters lately.
But the safety of executives close to our sponsors is more important.
Because I am in the middle of a battle right now.
I just defeated them, but I am now heading to the stage with the secret boss.
Thanks for being my bodyguard today, Metal Bat.
I came here because I was told that there was an important mission...
Apparently executives from the Hero Association are also being targeted right now,
but my son insisted on trying some commoner food today.
There is even pudding on this thing!
I was wondering how vile sushi must be if it is under 10,000 yen,
but it seems this can actually be quite fun.
Do not put back a plate you ate from!
They need it when they tally up your total.
But returning the plates is proper etiquette.
I just told you not to return the plates!
The color of this urchin is awful.
Do not they have any caviar?
You can actually eat part of a tuna that is not fatty tuna?
Next time they try to put a plate back, I will kill them!
Did you get a phone call?
I suddenly got a really important mission.
I promise I will take you shopping some other time.
You have got it all wrong!
I am the one who wants to cry.
I am never taking requests from executives ever again.
He is definitely an executive from the Hero Association.
How nice of him to bring his kid.
I am not letting you set foot outside this place.
Charanko said he entered on a whim.
I would not be surprised if someone strong was actually here.
May I have your name, sir?
Please write down your fighting style.
Charanko (Fist of Water Polo, Carbonation) Green Room
So this is the lineup for this tournament...
I wonder if this Bakuzan guy is strong, then.
Or if we go the other way, I guess this Suiryu guy is the seed.
Did you forget the face of your senpai?
Is Fist of Water Polo, Carbonation supposed to be some kind of joke?
Well, I cannot blame you for panicking.
He better not have entered the tournament in my place...
I guess he is not that stupid.
Charanko, do you know why I entered this tournament?
I could not care less, to be honest.
Could you please just go away?
First, because this Super Fight tournament
is one of the best ways for a fighter to make a name for themselves.
Master Bang won a while back.
The incident that happened at last year's tournament.
The winner was a masked fighter named Wolfman.
But later on, they found the actual Wolfman unconscious.
And that is why they banned entering under false names and the use of disguises.
You putting down a false fighting style might also be in the gray area.
What happens if they find out?
You are stripped your qualifications and permanently banned.
you will probably also be sued and slapped with a huge fine.
have an idea who that despicable impostor was!
After seeing the video of them fighting, I am certain I know who it is.
There is no doubt about it.
The impostor in the last tournament
And let me borrow that book.
I told you, you cannot borrow it.
I am saying... that we should read it together.
So it is right after the incident where he was expelled by our master.
There is no doubt about it.
You were off slacking somewhere, so I am sure you did not know,
but it happened while the master was gone.
There is nothing else I can learn here.
Let us have an actual fight.
He was hiding his true intent while sharpening his fangs.
If he had not shown up, we would not have had to leave the dojo, damn it!
That is why I am going to win this tournament today
Confidence that I can get to Garo's level.
But to think that you would have the guts to enter the Super Fight when
you were one of the weakest at the dojo...
I hear you are calling yourself Master Bang's top student,
but do not get too full of yourself.
So Saitama might enter the tournament in your place.
If someone inexperienced ends up entering a tournament like that...
You do not need to worry.
You know, I would not have left the dojo if I would known
that Garo was going to be expelled.
But if I had not quit,
I, Sourface, would have been Master Bang's number one student right now.
Why do not we practice some holds until you pass out again?
But you did quit the dojo, right?
But anyway, I plan on defeating Garo myself.
As long as he is hunting heroes, I am sure I will run into him sooner or later.
What I am saying is that
you ran away, so you do not get to act like you are better than me.
You would better be prepared to defend those words!
The Super Fight is a one-day tournament.
If you can actually manage to win your way to the top,
we are going to bump heads in the ring.
And that is when I will show you
I do not remember what that feels like at all.
He defeated them in no time!
All right, let us take a picture to remember this.
Hey, hurry up and take cover.
Venus-People Trap and I were both annihilated instantly.
Considering what you did to us, I guess you really are strong,
So that is what a Class S hero is like, huh?
But if you are that strong, you probably think you are the strongest.
I should probably finish you off.
But then, my senpai showed up...
That thing's twice the size of the other one!
So the hero hunter Garo has nothing to do with this?
Well, thinking about that is not going to help right now.
I am just going to crush you!
He will get back up and face the enemy, no matter what!
So you do not have to worry about Saitama!
Besides, he would never break the rules to enter in your place.
He is a hero, after all!
He just looks like some guy in a dog costume.
He is a Class S hero!
He usually sits atop his own special lookout.
You can meet him there at any time!
Monsters have appeared in the shopping district of City S.
Currently, Class S hero Metal Bat is on the scene.
Everyone outside should immediately seek shelter indoors.
No wonder he gave our kohai trouble.
What the hell do you guys want?
We will tell you if you can defeat us.
Looks like my sleep smell is finally kicking in.
Take that, and that, and that!
He just... hit himself in the head?
Did you finally lose your mind?!
Man, I feel so much better.
He is even more powerful than before!
But my sleep smell should not wear off that easily...
If I can pump myself up, I can pretty much handle anything.
You guys beat me pretty damn hard earlier.
But you see, I am a pretty nice guy...
So I will wipe you both out
I have not been that pumped in a while.
I forgot to ask the monsters what their motive was!
Or should I smack you awake?
We came to back you up!
Well, Metal Bat never ceases to amaze me.
The fact that Centikohai and Centisenpai appeared one after another
You remember the incident from two years ago, do not you?
It will not be a matter of bodyguards anymore.
I will go call for Class S backup.
Let us get out of here for now.
That thing's after that family there.
You guys take them while I deal with this guy.
Is that thing staring at us?
My full swing did not even make a crack in that thing.
That bastard made sure I did not hit its face with the bat.
So that is exactly where I am going to aim!
This is what a Dragon-level monster is like?
Humanity should not have to face something like that!
Another Dragon-level monster has appeared in City S.
I guess that would happen when a Dragon-level monster appears.
Now, I wonder if I will find Metal Bat alive...
To think that a Class S hero was done in by any other monster but me...
Man... I need to hurry up and get back.
H-Hey, wait a sec, Metal Bat!
If you are alive, that is a different story!
Now you have to fight me.
I am going to hunt you!
What the hell are you talking about, you moron?
Do not you see that giant centipede?
So you are the human calling yourself the hero-hunting monster...
If you are picking a fight with me, I am going to bash your crazy head in.
There is a Dragon-level monster in City S!
You girls are going to watch the Super Fight, right?
I have not been there in ages, so I do not remember the way.
